About me

Context behind the research, photography, and tools you see here.

Hello! I'm Zhonghan Qin, currently based in Wuhan, China. I research human-AI collaboration, embodied intelligence, and multi-agent systems, always aiming to make technology genuinely useful for human decision-making and creativity. I'm also a photographer who enjoys telling stories through images.

Photography keeps me observant—the neon lights, strangers passing by at night, and the textures of nature all remind me, just like algorithms do, that the key is learning how to interpret complex signals and tell better stories. This site is more than a portfolio; it's a growing digital garden.

I believe in open knowledge. Tools like TrendRadar and Daily arXiv AI Enhanced will keep evolving in public with help from the community. I also turn paper notes, project retrospectives, and behind-the-lens anecdotes into blog posts—feel free to reach out anytime.

If you have ideas about my research focus, photography projects, or tools, drop me a line at zhonghanqin666@gmail.com or open an issue/PR on GitHub. Let's turn sparks into solid work together.

Y

Zhonghan Qin

Researcher · Creator · Open-source enthusiast
